resources.string: Welcome to the NUMBER1 canadian clothing store. AdeshinaStore is not just a store or business, it is a lifestyle for both the owners and employees. Find fashionable clothing for men, women and kids at affordable prices. \n Shaping your style is as easy as 1,2,3

NAVY BLUE - 9240/422

 Piqué polo shirt with Mandarin collar in matching fabric and short sleeves with ribbed trim. Front button closure.

 MODEL HEIGHT: 6’ 2” (189 cm). SIZE L 

 JOIN LIFE
Care for fiber: 100% ecologically grown cotton. Ecologically grown cotton is grown using practices that help us protect biodiversity, such as crop rotation or the use of natural fertilizers.
CAMEL - 0706/202\n\n Bomber jacket made of faux leather fabric with faux fur interior and collar. Long sleeves with elasticized cuffs. Front snap button pockets. Elastic hem. Front zip closure.
WHITE - 5372/313\n\n Roomy T-shirt with round neck and short sleeves. Front illustration by James Wilson.
DARK BLUE - 6045/302\n\nSkinny jeans with washed effect. Five pockets. Front zip and metal button closure.
BROWN - 0706/202\n\nBomber jacket made of faux leather fabric with faux fur interior and collar. Long sleeves with elasticized cuffs. Front snap button pockets. Elastic hem. Front zip closure.
CAMEL - 0458/301\n\nLightweight knit polo with shirt collar and long sleeves. Ribbed trim. Front zip closure.
DARK BLUE - 5575/301\n\nDenim shorts with washed effect. Five pockets. Cuffed hems. Front zip and metal button closure.
BEIGE - 3918/310\n\nHigh collar jacket with long sleeves. Zip pockets at hip. Interior pocket. Front metal zip closure and adjustable hem with appliqué.

MULTICOLOR - 2355/002\n\nLace-up sneakers. Combination of colors and materials at upper with nylon, split leather trim, and technical pieces. Shoelaces with seven pairs of eyelets. Multicolor treaded sole.
BLACK - 5628/002\n\nSlipper style loafers. Black. Raised silver texture all over upper. Fringed tassel detail and metal finish at facing.
